title: Stay summary
text: Patient discharged with improved vitals. Continue ACE inhibitor and schedule cardiology follow-up in 2 weeks.
raw_text: PATIENT DISCHARGED WITH IMPROVED VITALS. continue ace inhibitor. cardio follow up 2w.

title: CT Abdomen
text: CT abdomen shows no acute process. Stable hepatic cysts. Recommend repeat imaging in 12 months.
raw_text: ct ABD: no acute process. stable hepatic cysts. repeat imaging 12mo.

title: Nephrology consult
text: Nephrology consulted for rising creatinine. Suspect prerenal etiology; start IV fluids and monitor labs daily.
raw_text: nephro consult for inc creatinine. prerenal? start ivf, labs daily.
